stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

features.html:
In the following code segment,  x  is an  int  variable with a positive value.

 

int temp = x;
while (temp > 0)
{
   temp -= 2;
}
System.out.println(temp == 0);

choicesHtml: It prints  0  if  x  is even and prints  -1  otherwise.
It prints  -1  if  x  is even and prints  0  otherwise.
It prints  true  if  x  is even and prints  false  otherwise.
It prints  false  if  x  is even and prints  true  otherwise.
